Scene:
In front of the Storehouse
(Kuramae / 蔵前)

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

Production: January 1992



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danshichi (see also Takezawa Danjirō IV) (竹澤団七)

Takezawa Dango (竹澤団吾)



Performers:
